features.name: Authentication System
features.description: User login system with localStorage-based session management and protected routes

features.name: Employee Management Form
features.description: Form component for adding and editing employee information (name, email, position)

features.name: Employee List Management
features.description: Table view for displaying employees with search, view, edit, and delete functionality

features.name: Navigation Menu
features.description: Top navigation bar with login/logout, theme toggle, and navigation links

features.name: Theme Management
features.description: Light/dark theme toggle functionality using Material-UI theme provider

features.name: Routing System
features.description: Client-side routing with protected routes for authenticated users

features.name: API Integration
features.description: HTTP client integration for backend communication using Axios

features.name: Backend REST API
features.description: Express.js server with SQLite database for employee CRUD operations and authentication

features.name: Database Management
features.description: SQLite database for storing employee records

features.name: UI Components
features.description: Material-UI based responsive interface components including cards, tables, forms, and dialogs
